newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Dow industrials lower at start.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Dow industrials lower at start.

text.p: The Dow industrials were lower at the start of trading Wednesday after inching to a new record close yesterday. Analysts said that interest rate fears again permeated the market.
Dow Industrials fell 12 points to 7,073. The 30-year long bond rose 1/32 to yield 6.85 percent.
